io.nem.symbol.core.math

Class SparseMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.core.math.Matrix
      • io.nem.symbol.core.math.SparseMatrix

  • public class SparseMatrix
extends Matrix
    Represents a sparse matrix.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SparseMatrix

        public SparseMatrix(int numRows,
                    int numCols,
                    int initialCapacityPerRow)
        Creates a new matrix of the specified size which has a given capacity for each row.
        Parameters:
        numRows - The desired number of rows to represent.
        numCols - The desired number of columns to represent.
        initialCapacityPerRow - The initial capacity of a row. Choose carefully to avoid reallocation!
